welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Forestdale, a charming town known for its lush green forests and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy the beauty and hospitality that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is home to gates A1-A5 and serves American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is home to gates B1-B7 and serves Delta Air Lines and United Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
